pullrequest.title: New mechanism for updating the value of components

content.raw:
> UpdateComponent updates the component immediately. This is not the preferred way to update components, but I thought we might need such a function in some systems.

Yeah that's a tricky one, because if a system uses it, we can't ensure that it will not be overridden later by someone who used `Request*`. My feeling is that it would be safer to only provide the `Request` interface, unless we can think of a legitimate use for the other one. Also, what do you think of calling it `Set` instead of `Update`?
